info.title: Azure Load Testing
info.description: These APIs allow end users to create, view and run load tests using Azure Load Test Service.

patch.summary: Associate app component (an azure resource model) to a test model or test run

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for app component name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: App component model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for app component name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get App components for a given appComponentName in query param.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for app component name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get App components for a test model or a test run of given name in query param.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Required testRunId, if testId is not provided

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Associate server metrics config to a test model or test run

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for server metric name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Server metrics config model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics config for a given name in query param.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for server metric name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete server metrics config by given name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Unique identifier for server metric name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

204.description: The server metrics config is deleted

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get server metrics config for a test model or test run of given name in query param.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Required testRunId, if testId is not provided

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all default server metrics config with supported resource type

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all supported resource types for app components(azure resource types)

200.description: The supported resource types and metrics for server side metrics

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Creates/Updates a new load test. Test name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test with given name. Test name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get load test model of given test name

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all load tests for a given Fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - lastModifiedDateTime, displayName, createdBy in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields- testId, createdBy.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedStartTime
parameters.description: Start DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedEndTime
parameters.description: End DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get then next page of response

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: No of results in response

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

put.summary: Upload input file for a given test name. File name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$. File size can't be more than 50 MB. Existing file with same name for the given test will be overwritten.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test file with given file name.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete file of given file name for a test. File name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.
The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test run with given name. Test run name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create and start new test run of the given name, test run name must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: oldTestRunId
parameters.description: Existing testRunId to re run new test

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test run model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run of given name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get testrun file with given file name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for test run file, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all test runs with given filters

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort on one of the field - status, displayName, executedDateTime in (field asc/desc) format. eg: displayName asc

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Continuation token to get then next page of response

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter search based on searchable fields - description, executedUser.

parameters.name: executionFrom
parameters.description: The end DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: executionTo
parameters.description: The start DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of test run status, value can be -  "ACCEPTED", "NOTSTARTED","PROVISIONING","PROVISIONED","CONFIGURING",
"CONFIGURED","EXECUTING","EXECUTED","DEPROVISIONING","DEPROVISIONED","DONE","CANCELLED","FAILED"

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: No of results in response

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.summary: Stop test run of given name.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

200.description: The requested test run is stopped. Call GET /testruns/{testRunId} to check the status

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.summary: Get all client metrics for a given load test run

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client metrics request model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all client metrics supported filters list for a given load test run

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for load test run name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

AppComponent.description: The Azure resource object (Refer azure generic resource model : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/resources/resources/get-by-id#genericresource)

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of Azure resource

testId.description: [Required if testRunId is not given] Load test unique identifier

testRunId.description: [Required if testId is not given] Load test run unique identifier

value.description: AppComponents Map { resource id (Fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}) : resource object }

testRunId.description: Test run name for which client metrics filters is required.

requestSamplers.description: List of request samplers, maximum supported samplers for queries are 20. In case of empty, it will return metrics for maximum 20 samplers

errors.description: List of errors, maximum supported errors for queries are 20. In case of empty, by default will return metrics for maximum 20 errors

percentiles.description: List of percentiles values for response time, supported values 50,90,99,95. Default value is 50th percentile.

groupByInterval.description: For test duration less than 10 minutes group by time interval can be any one of 5s,10s,1m,5m.\n\nFor test duration greater than 10 minutes, group by time interval can be any one of 1m,5m,1h. Default value is 1m.

testRunId.description: Test run name for which client metrics results is required.

defaultMetrics.description: Default metrics map {resourceType : list of metrics config} (Refer for metrics structure: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition)

ErrorResponseBody.description: The definition of an error object.

requestSamplerValues.description: List of request sampler for the test run, for which client metrics can be filtered

errorFiltersValues.description: List of errors occurred for the test run, for which client metrics can be filtered

InputTestArtifacts.description: The input artifacts for the test

additionalUrls.description: The input artifacts file { name : url } map for the test run

engineInstances.description: The number of engine instances to execute load test. Supported values are in range of 1-50. Required for creating a new Test.

splitAllCSVs.description: Whether all the input CSV files need to be split evenly accross all engines.

OutputTestArtifacts.description: The output artifacts for the test run

PassFailCriteria.description: Pass fail criteria for a test

passFailMetrics.description: Map of id and pass fail metrics { id  : pass fail metrics }

clientmetric.description: The client metric on which the criteria should be applied. Allowed values - response_time_ms , latency, error

aggregate.description: The aggregation function to be applied on the client metric. Allowed functions - percentage - for error metric , avg - for response_time_ms and latency metric

value.description: The value to compare with the client metric. Allowed values - error : [0.0 , 100.0] unit- % , response_time_ms and latency : any integer value unit- ms

action.description: Either stop or continue after the threshold is met. Default is continue

actualValue.description: The actual value of the client metric for the test run

result.description: Outcome of the testRun. possible outcome - passed , failed , undetermined

ResourceMetricModel.description: Associated metric definition for particular metrics of the azure resource ( Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition)

value.description: The value of the secret. of type== akv-secret-uri or secret-value

testId.description: [Required if testRunId is not given] Load test unique identifier

testRunId.description: [Required if testId is not given] Load test run unique identifier

metrics.description: Metrics map {metric id : metrics object} (Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition for metric id)

SupportedResourceType.description: Supported azure resource types for app component like Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests, Microsoft.ClassicCompute, Microsoft.ClassicStorage etc. (Refer for full list of available resource types in azure : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/resource-providers-and-types, some of them we are supporting for server side metrics configuration)

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the test model

createdBy.description: The user that created the test model

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the test model

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that last modified the test model

secrets.description: Secrets of higher importance , which are stored in a key-vault typically. Allowed secret type: AKV_SECRET_URI

environmentVariables.description: Secrets of relatively lesser importance , which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run

keyvaultReferenceIdentityType.description: Type of the managed identity referencing the Key vault

keyvaultReferenceIdentityId.description: Resource Id of the managed identity referencing the Key vault

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

testRunId.description: Unique test run name as identifier

startDateTime.description: The test run start DateTime(Iso8601Literal format)

endDateTime.description: The test run end DateTime(Iso8601Literal format)

testResult.description: Test result for pass/Fail criteria used during the test run. possible outcome - Passed , Failed , Not Applicable

vusers.description: No of virtual users, for which test has been run

createdDateTime.description: The created DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the test run

createdBy.description: The user that created the test run

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last updated  DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) of the test run

lastModifiedBy.description: The user that updated the test run

secrets.description: Secrets of higher importance , which are stored in a key-vault typically. Allowed secret types: AKV_SECRET_URI/SECRET_VALUE

environmentVariables.description: Secrets of relatively lesser importance , which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of resources in case of paginated results, if applicable

startTime.description: start DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) for the requested client metrics filter

endTime.description: end DateTime(Iso8601Literal format) for the requested client metrics filter

TestId.description: Unique identifier for load test name, must be a valid URL character ^[a-z0-9_-]*$
